ai-tha-ap351:0.3_0: he gave the Elder Tissa to the Fruit of Once
ai-tha-ap351:2.1_0: Having seen (that) with your Fruits’ essential,
ai-tha-ap351:2.2_0: Having breakfast, their own slavery is (body).
ai-tha-ap351:3.2_0: I used to be a fruit.
ai-tha-ap351:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap351:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nandaka.
ai-tha-ap351:6.1_0: (For) the Elder Tissaka advice he gave honey to the Elder Tissārāma.
